QuestData.Title: Drakes be Gone
QuestData.Description:
The primalists have been ceaselessly attacking our camp with their drakes!
We've been able to keep them at bay with our shields, but we could use more aid in taking them out of the sky.
Use one of our blasters to take those drakes down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use an Arcane Blaster to defeat $1oa proto-drakes.
